{Markdown}
**Title (Eng.)**: Supply of a Gas Chromatograph/Autosampler
**Title (Fran.)**: Fourniture d'un chromatographe en phase gazeuse/échantillonneur automatique

**Reference**: cb-301-25442213
**Amendment**: 1

**Solicitation Number**: 5000075064R
**Publication Date**: May 30, 2024
**Closing Date**: July 10, 2024 6:00 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Start Date**: June 26, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: July 31, 2024

**Tender Notice**

Environment and Climate Change Canada invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit bids for the supply of a Gas Chromatograph/Autosampler under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI.

**Trade Agreements**

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Tender Description**

This request is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI, for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, and accessories, services, and supplies. The Government of Canada requires a Gas Chromatograph/Autosampler. 

Suppliers that have been pre-qualified on supply arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to submit bids. The responsive bidder that meets the mandatory technical criteria and obtains the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for contract award.

**Eligibility**

To be eligible, suppliers must have a pre-existing relationship with Public Works and Government Services Canada under the subject supply arrangement. 

**Submission Guidelines**

The tender notice is published on Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) in both English and French for a period of 40 calendar days. Suppliers are encouraged to submit bids within this timeframe.

Please address all inquiries regarding this solicitation to:
